cmp_type._comment2: name -- comapre file names, -chksum -- compare checksum values -data -- perform heauristic data comparsion
cmp_type.name: y

extensions._comment1: for each extension block, please provide command line to execute
extensions._comment2: and comma separated list of additional paramaters.
extensions._comment3: Please note that order or prm list should match with command line placeholders ({})
extensions._comment4: first two placeholders are always for filea and fileb under comparison
extensions._comment5: exp_out is always compares with the stdout from commands

.vcf.gz._comment: ignore differences in header except contig names
put all exceptions at the start of exp_out with OR [|] symbol

.vcf._comment: ignore differences in header except contig names
put all exceptions at the start of exp_out with OR symbol

other_prm._comment1: file extension used to get common prefix value which can be ignored when comparing file names in two archives
other_prm._comment2: file extension to considered to extended file extenion to make it unique e.g., .gz to .vcf.gz
